chooseExplanation: Choose the correct explanation for the word . . .
howtoplay2: Choose an XPLANDER (game leader) who writes a number of words with explanations, one word for every game round you want to play, up to eight rounds. Feel free to use a dictionary!
howtoplay4: Let all players write an explanation that describe the word displayed on the screen as believable as possible.
howtoplay5: The XPLANDER reads out loud the explanations the players has written including the correct explanation. The players will then vote on the explanation they believe is the correct one. When the round is finished, the winner of the round will be announced. The player recieves 2 points if they vote for the correct explanation and 1 point if a player votes on the player's own explanation.
howtoplay6: Note! If you already know the meaning of the word - write the real explanation and make it sound EVEN more believable!
pleaseVote: Vote by selecting one of the explanations:
results: Here is how you voted in
question: Question
startexplanation: The parts in the middle of your face

labelsData: Waiting is the last obstacle before gaming glory!
